- A central processing unit (CPU)
- Multiple encoder cores
- Multiple decoder cores
- Direct Memory Access (DMA)
- LPDDR (Low Power Double Data Rate) interfaces
- A PCIe (Peripheral Component Interconnect express) interface

The arrangement suggests a focus on the parallel processing capabilities of the unit, with a substantial number of dedicated encoder cores for video encoding tasks and decoder cores for decoding tasks. The LPDDR interfaces indicate where the VCU would connect to memory, and the PCIe interface shows how the VCU would connect to other components in a system.
